titles: The art of memory, that otherwyse is called the Phenix A boke very behouefull and profytable to all professours of scyences. Grammaryens, rethoryciens dialectyke, legystes, phylosophres [and] theologiens.
author: Petrus, Ravennas, ca. 1448-1508 or 9.
Copland, Robert, fl. 1540-1547.
publisher: In Fletestrete at the sygne of the George by Wyllyam Myddylton,
notes: A translation, by Robert Copland, out of French into English, of: Petrus Ravennas.  Artificiosa memoria.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
